content:
Craft an item of type: birch_slab
inventory=[{"type": "chiseled_red_sandstone", "quantity": 12, "index": 15}, {"type": "gray_terracotta", "quantity": 27, "index": 20}, {"type": "kelp", "quantity": 59, "index": 21}, {"type": "golden_hoe", "quantity": 1, "index": 35}, {"type": "birch_planks", "quantity": 3, "index": 36}]
thought: To craft birch slabs, I need to place birch planks in the first row of the crafting grid. There are 3 birch planks in slot 36, so I'll move one of them to slot 1.
act: move from slot 36 to slot 1 with quantity 1

Craft an item of type: birch_slab
inventory=[{"type": "birch_button", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "birch_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "chiseled_red_sandstone", "quantity": 12, "index": 15}, {"type": "gray_terracotta", "quantity": 27, "index": 20}, {"type": "kelp", "quantity": 59, "index": 21}, {"type": "golden_hoe", "quantity": 1, "index": 35}, {"type": "birch_planks", "quantity": 2, "index": 36}]
thought: I still need more birch planks in the first row of the crafting grid, so I'll move another one from slot 36 to slot 2.
act: move from slot 36 to slot 2 with quantity 1

inventory=[{"type": "birch_pressure_plate", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "birch_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "birch_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "chiseled_red_sandstone", "quantity": 12, "index": 15}, {"type": "gray_terracotta", "quantity": 27, "index": 20}, {"type": "kelp", "quantity": 59, "index": 21}, {"type": "golden_hoe", "quantity": 1, "index": 35}, {"type": "birch_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 36}]
thought: I still need more birch planks in the first row of the crafting grid, so I'll move the last one from slot 36 to slot 3.
act: move from slot 36 to slot 3 with quantity 1

inventory=[{"type": "birch_slab", "quantity": 6, "index": 0}, {"type": "birch_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "birch_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "birch_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 3}, {"type": "chiseled_red_sandstone", "quantity": 12, "index": 15}, {"type": "gray_terracotta", "quantity": 27, "index": 20}, {"type": "kelp", "quantity": 59, "index": 21}, {"type": "golden_hoe", "quantity": 1, "index": 35}]
thought: The birch slabs have been crafted, so I'll move them to a free inventory slot (eg., 11).
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 6
